section.title: The import contact list parties screen
section.para: This is the initial screen to find an existing parties and select them for import to the contact list.

section.title: Find selection fields.
section.para: Party Id : The unique id of the party
Party Type Id : The type of the party
Role Type : The role of the party
Contact Mech Type Id : the contact type according to the contact meth type's ID of the contact list. There is a sub form for this field according to the contact mech type's ID.

section.title: Import the parties
section.para: Select the parties in the search result list.
